# O
CycloneIdai O
Safety O
Tips O
3 O
. O
Just O
15 O
cm O
of O
moving O
water O
can O
knock O
you O
off O
your O
feet O
, O
while O
60 O
cm O
deep O
can O
sweep O
a O
vehicle O
away O
. O
Generally O
, O
if O
the O
water O
is O
deeper O
than O
the O
bottom O
of O
your O
doors O
or O
the O
bottom O
third O
of O
your O
wheels O
, O
it O
is O
not O
advisable O
to O
drive O
through O
it O
; O
